sentences.sContent: The bank foreclosed on the mortgage for his previous home.
sentences.sCn: 银行取消了他先前住房的抵押赎回权。

synos.tran: 阻止；排除；取消抵押品赎回权

remMethod.val: fore(以前的) + close(关闭) → 排除

trans.tranCn: 阻止；排除；取消抵押品赎回权
trans.tranOther: if a bank forecloses, it takes away someone’s property because they have failed to pay back the money that they borrowed from the bank to buy it
